tswitem.name: AEGIS Firmware Upgrade v3.0
tswitem.tooltip:
AEGIS Firmware Upgrade v3.0
Toolkit (QL 10 Epic)
Tradeable
Upgrades the firmware of an AEGIS controller, allowing it to be upgraded to the next major version. Requires 100% completed analysis of filth samples to complete this upgrade. This firmware upgrade can only upgrade an AEGIS controller from v2.9 to v3.0 and is consumed in the upgrade process.
